PCM.settings.minimalRole.name: Minimal role to pin others' messages
PCM.settings.minimalRole.hint: Minimal role to pin the chat message of another user
PCM.settings.protectPinnedFromDeletion.h: The pinned message will not be delete by the delete all button
PCM.settings.disablePinForAll.name: Disable the default pinned for player
PCM.settings.disablePinForAll.hint: The player can no longer pinned for everybody
PCM.settings.disableSelfPin.name: Disable the self pinned for player
PCM.settings.disableSelfPin.hint: The player can no longer pinned for himself
